com.ykb.posnet.merchant.sample.xml
Class ResponseParser

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.ykb.posnet.merchant.sample.xml.ResponseParser
public class ResponseParser
extends java.lang.Object

Sample Posnet XML Service client which provides methods to parse Posnet XML service responses.

It also provides a main method, therefore it is runnable. For the sake of simplicity, its main method takes an xml file to send to posnet system as a command line argument. It does not deal with constructing xml request. It then contacts Posnet XML Service and sends the xml file. It finally receives and parses the response.
